name: Calculate Hours for Configure EBI FPS Server
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(FDA EBI FPS Server Configuration:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval((4*<*VALUE(FDA Number of FNAs)*>)+([IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(FDA Rudundant EBI Servers)*>,Yes)){12}{0}[ENDIF])+(12*<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Servers)*>)) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(FDA GES Location.None)*>)){<* Eval((4*<*VALUE(FDA Number of FNAs)*>)+([IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(FDA Rudundant EBI Servers)*>,Yes)){12}{0}[ENDIF])+(12*<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Servers)*>)) *>}{<* Eval((4*<*VALUE(FDA Number of FNAs)*>)+([IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(FDA Rudundant EBI Servers)*>,Yes)){12}{0}[ENDIF])+(12*<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Servers)*>)) *>}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
